share on x pb peggy benton. jun 21 at 7:14 pm sorry to hear of betty jane's passing . you are in our thoughts and prayers. robert and peggy benton. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bm barbara mc. millanjun 21 at 9:30 am lit a candle in memory of elizabeth jane (betty jane) bell. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bb buddy and elaine brinkley. jun 21 at 7:36 am d. w. and family, we were sorry to hear of betty's death. we remember fondly our years ar ravenwood. may god comfort you and bring peace in the coming days. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dr diana richards. jun 20 at 6:31 pm so sorry for your lost. praying that god will be with you and help you with the lost of your love one. that god will help to ease the pain and help to heal you. frank & diana richards. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 20 at 5:53 pm fields of europe for spring was purchased for the family of elizabeth jane (betty jane) bell. share on x more memories... visitation. jun 22. hand memorial united methodist church242 hand ave. pelham, ga, us, 31779. get order flowers now for elizabeth jane's visitation service. jun 22. 1:00 pm hand memorial united methodist church242 hand ave. pelham, ga, us, 31779. get order flowers now for elizabeth jane's service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe willis-jamerson-braswell funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for elizabeth jane's visitation service. jun 22. 1:00 pm hand memorial united methodist church242 hand ave. pelham, ga, us, 31779. get order flowers now for elizabeth jane's service show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of elizabeth jane (betty jane) bell a friend sent flowers to the family of elizabeth jane (betty jane) bell. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! li lisa. jun 21 at 7:22 pm i will always remember betty jane taking care of all her babies. she was a wonderful example of a mother who put her children first staying at home and taking care of them. i remember all the barbie clothes she made in her small sewing place. i always looked forward to the visits around july 4th. she would bring me new clothes for my barbies. i know she touched a lot of lives and god said, "well done good and faithful servant". it is sad for us, but wonderful for her, that he called her home to him. we will miss you. lisa bell highsmith. comment share comment share facebook twitter
